name: lambda-starter
description: Starter repo for lambda functions using serverless

scripts.exampleFunction: AWS_PROFILE=serverless-admin serverless invoke local --function exampleFunction --path mocks/example.mock.json
scripts.createUserExample: AWS_PROFILE=serverless-admin serverless invoke local --function createUserExample --path mocks/createUserExample.mock.json
scripts.getUserExample: AWS_PROFILE=serverless-admin serverless invoke local --function getUserExample --path mocks/getUserExample.mock.json

author: Tanner Rigby
